source: Directory of Open Access Repositories (DOAR); The Registry of Open Access Repositories Mandates and Policies (ROARMAP); Webometrics by the Cybermetrics Lab

description: indicator of the citation impact of high education institutions
the amount of years since the OA repository was established
source: Calculated by the year_established in Directory of Open Access Repositories (DOAR)

description: the amount of years since the institution's open access policy became effective
source: Calculated by the policy_effective in The registry of Open Access Repositories Mandates and Policies (ROARMAP)
